concept.title: Advantages of using an audio hub

conbody.p: Dialog 5 audio hub together with student interface devices allows you to transmit audio over dedicated lines bypassing the classroom LAN.
By using Dialog Nibelung with the audio hub you can avoid the following problems frequently arising from transmission of audio across computer networks:

ul.li: degraded audio quality: pops, clicks and dropouts;

conbody.note: Audio loopback allows you to hear yourself through your headset. Support for audio hardware loopback was eliminated in Windows Vista and subsequent versions, while its software emulation introduces additional delay and echo.
Installation of the audio hub should be performed by a qualified technician. Please contact the manufacturer (http://www.lainlab.com) if you require further assistance.
